title: Adolescents and young adults with life-threatening illness: special considerations, transitions in care, and the role of pediatric palliative care.
summary: This article will cover the special considerations, challenges, and opportunities presented by caring for adolescents and young adults with life-threatening illnesses when the possibility of transition to an adult care setting arises....
abstract: This article will cover the special considerations, challenges, and opportunities presented by caring for adolescents and young adults with life-threatening illnesses when the possibility of transition to an adult care setting arises.
